sectionThree.heading: PRIVATE KEYS:  A Single Point of Failure
sectionThree.text: VULTISIG eliminates the risks of traditional key management with next-gen crypto vaults.

items.title: Private key creation
items.description: Creating private keys in one place makes them vulnerable to theft or loss. One mistake and your assets are at risk.

items.title: Storage of private keys
items.description: Private keys stored in one place create a single point of failure, exposing your funds to hackers or mismanagement.

items.title: Human error
items.description: People are vulnerable to being exploited or tricked. Most wallet drains happen due to social engineering that reveals the private key.

itemOne.title: Introducing Vultisigs recovery: vault shares instead of seed phrases
description: With Vultisig, you bring your own trusted devices - phone, desktop, laptops or tablets.

Your devices create vaults together using their unique shards called “vault shares”, which are unique to each device. The private key never exists, the devices just proof the collaborative access to it!
Individual Vault-shares never store funds and can be safely imported/exported anywhere.
Each vault is natively multi-factor -- and you can co-sign safely anywhere in the world.
Store each device's Vault Share separately and sleep soundly.
